text: i remember the way we used to need so
much hardware on site
often over provisioning then running out
of capacity and struggling to expand
when we needed to
the launch of amazon s3 in 2006 was a
seminal moment for data storage
this invention totally changed our
trajectory at smugmug
[Music]
today we use almost everything aws has
to offer
and it's been quite an amazing journey
we started out
using just a single relational database
for everything
for all of our data workloads and that
was total overkill
as we've grown up with aws they've
continued to add more and more data
stores and analytics tools
that have let us really pick the best
tools for the best job
to serve our customers tools like athena
redshift
elasticsearch kinesis and dynamodb
which allows us to scale and serve
photos at
billions of requests per day and we use
tools like glue to take that vast
treasure trove of data we have in s3 and
feed it into all of these other data
stores so that we can know exactly
what's going on inside of our business
and exactly what we should work on next
for our customers
the cloud has totally reinvented how we
store
secure analyze and share data at a scale
that we couldn't have even imagined
14 years ago
